definition[0]: to succeed in communicating an idea or piece of information to someone, or to be communicated successfully
example[1]: It took him ages to get his point across.
example[2]: We must get across the simple fact that drugs are dangerous.
example[3]: It is important that we get this message across to voters.
definition[1]: to succeed in making people understand what you are telling them
example[4]: Toget itsmessage across, Reebok will boost its advertising budget this year to $220 million.
